actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1454.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Montana to the occupants of the land.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title and interest (except mineral rights) in certain public lands in Montana to specified occupants of such lands.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Montana to the occupants of the land.
